name: photogallery-microservices
description: Applicazione galleria fotografica con architettura a microservizi (Versione Light)

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd gateway && npm install && cd ../services/user-service && npm install && cd ../album-service && npm install && cd ../image-service && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:users" "npm run dev:albums" "npm run dev:images"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd gateway && npm start" "cd services/user-service && npm start" "cd services/album-service && npm start" "cd services/image-service && npm start"

author: ITS Academy
